name: Redactem
description: Rewind time and manipulate gravity in order to solve parkour puzzles in this exciting new 2D platformer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2GHZ Dual Core or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or better Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Only official Xbox and Logitech controllers are supported.

reviews.review_text: a classic styled, level based, 2-D puzzle/skill game. Though this game may be QUITE frustrating at times, it takes about an hour and a half to beat (i may be the first because i got it from an early access code and started playing the second i could). You progress through the game using a small aresonal of abilities and movement options such as changing the direction of gravity, wall jumps, and even rewinding the movement of your player. The levels become progressively harder over time and can take a deal of persistance to get through. I would recomment this game to anyone that wants a challenging, 2-D, skill based game that doesn't shy away from a damn good challenge.
I find that the game is very challenging. I I’m not a fan or super meat boy but if these are the games you enjoy then be sure to pick up a copy of Redactem.
This game is kind of ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ with a controller, but not bad, at least it's playable.(tbh, when the robot jumps, he sounds like Fox from Super Smash Bros Melee)
